answers.author: William Lindbergh
answers.text:
Heavy techs require 2 bays for each tech approx. 20X50 size 
Light techs require 1and a half bays for each tech approx. 10X30 size

author: Tom Clements
text: Is there a standard used to determine the size of fleet maintenance facility using the number of mechanics?
title: Fleet Maintinance
